data.actual_result: Change’s status in group to a “Restricted viewing access error page”.
data.expected_result: Just Leave the group and have the ability to join other groups at one’s leisure.
data.short_description: Leaves LFG group, but sometimes requires the user to select the “Leave Group” option again from the sidebar after already leaving.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a LFG group, it can be any group. Step 2 - Leave that LFG group, there is a chance that the group will still be on your sidebar and if clicked will show an error page that says you “don’t have access to view this group”.  Step 3- to remove this error, simply click the Leave Group icon until you fully leave the group, so that you may join another group.
